code: import React from'react';import{useLanguage}from'../contexts/LanguageContext';import{translations}from'../translations/translations';import ScrollReveal from'./ScrollReveal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const About=()=>{const{language}=useLanguage();const t=translations[language];const aboutCards=[{icon:"üéØ",title:t.specialization.title,description:t.specialization.description,number:"1"},{icon:"üí∞",title:t.cost.title,description:t.cost.description,number:"2"},{icon:"üí≥",title:t.payment.title,description:t.payment.description,number:"3"},{icon:"‚öôÔ∏è",title:t.stack.title,description:t.stack.description,number:"4"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"about",className:"about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ScrollReveal,{className:"reveal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:t.aboutTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"about-subtitle",children:t.aboutSubtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"about-description",children:t.aboutDescription})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-grid",children:aboutCards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ScrollReveal,{className:"reveal-scale",delay:index*150,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about-card-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-card-icon",children:card.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"about-card-title",children:card.title})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"about-card-description",children:card.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"about-card-number",children:card.number})]})},index))})]})});};export default About;
